title: Rossi penalized for kicking Marquez in Malaysian GP
text: Rossi penalized for kicking Marquez in Malaysian GP Sunday, 25 October 2015 (2 minutes ago) SEPANG, Malaysia (AP) " Championship leader Valentino Rossi will start the final race of the Moto GP season from the back of the grid after being penalized for kicking Marc Marquez during the Malaysian Grand Prix on Sunday.Dani... Recent related news Rossi and Marquez clashed at Sepang as Dani Pedrosa took victory, with Rossi's title rival Jorge Lorenzo coming home in second to reduce the lead to just seven... Independent 2 hours ago - Sports MotoGP championship leader Valentino Rossi will start from the back of the grid in the season finale after being penalised for causing Spanish rival Marc Marquez... SuperSport 3 hours ago - Sports Valentino Rossi will start from the back of the grid in Spain after kicking Marc Marquez off his bike during the Malaysian GP. BBC News 3 hours ago - UK Also reported by • Autosport Spain's Dani Pedrosa will start Sunday's Malaysian Grand Prix from pole position after recording the fastest ever lap by a MotoGP bike at Sepang.
